paper_abstract: This article presents a useful application for university courses in Engineering Graphics, and for manufacturing processes based on developing sheet metal. From the basis of a three-dimensional surface, the application can generate its development, as well as its area and perimeter that could be used by a conventional numerical control machine (CNC) to cut the sheet. (C) 2009 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Comput Appl Eng Educ 17: 295-304. 2009; Published online in Wiley InterScience (www.interscience.wiley.com); DOI 10.1002/cae.20247
paper_title: Educational Software to Develop Sheet Metal With Solid Edge
